content.rendered:
VISION

TIS International Primary – Secondary – High School aims to become a leading international educational environment, where students are comprehensively developed in Morality – Intelligence – Physicality – Aesthetics, combining international standards with the fine traditional values ​​of the Vietnamese people. TIS creates a generation of global citizens with profound and multidimensional learning abilities, ready to integrate and contribute to modern society.

MISSION

TIS International Primary – Secondary – High School is committed to providing parents and students with optimal personalized educational solutions, designed to suit the abilities, interests and individual conditions of each student. At TIS, each student is awakened to their maximum potential, creating conditions for them to confidently conquer study opportunities in advanced countries such as the United States, Canada, Australia, etc.

excerpt.rendered: TẦM NHÌN Trường Tiểu học – THCS – THPT Quốc Tế TIS hướng đến việc trở thành môi trường giáo dục quốc tế hàng đầu, nơi học sinh được phát triển toàn diện về Đức – Trí – Thể – Mỹ, kết hợp giữa trình độ quốc tế và những giá trị truyền thống tốt […]
